name: Boom Road 3d speed racing trucks
description:
boom road is one of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!

Run with all your might, race and crush other vehicles at the #1 FUN car racing and running game.
start racing and jumping hot wheels zimad, PLAY TO WIN & prove youíre the fastest! get ahead in the coolest & most addicting free racing game!

Cool & Fun Features :

- boom road gives you a lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: truck, jeep, tank, etc.)
- Share your score with a screenshot with your friends!
- Cool graphics, Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices.
- hot wheels zimad.
- Real turbo sound when you drive.
- climb racing zimad.

Get the game now for free and become the best driver.
If you like Boom road - racing car, please take the time to write a review. It really helps!
